Articles.Content: ok so when i get near the mun it dosen't get bigger always small, can't evan land on it . please help:(

We need ALOT more information than that to help you.

Also, this belongs in the support forum, or questions forum. Go there if you need help
Have you tried burning the other way?
That does sound amazingly similar to what happens when you get further away from the Mun.

Love that they put [PLEASE HELP] as if we wouldn't, and then put the thread in the wrong section...

More info is needed! Screenshots would be best, but also: what is your craft periapsis, do you have any mods installed, are you actually going towards the Mun?

I think you might want to try out some of the in-game tutorials that explain orbital mechanics and how to get to Mun. In addition, Vanamode has a nice Mun tutorial. I'm sure he'll be by soon to get you a link. Good luck!

Try press the M key to go to map view to see if you are actually going any closer to the Mun.

See if this video helps.
Do you at least have a picture (or even better a video) of the phenomenon?
Moved (provisionally) to Support. And yes, please give as much information as you can, and possibly screenshots.
